sentences.en: Bus drivers and motorists gripe about this dusty road.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车司机和其他的司机都抱怨这条尘土飞扬的道路.

sentences.en: Don't always gripe about something or other.
sentences.cn: 不要总是抱怨这,抱怨那的.

sentences.en: EXAMPLE : When the weather becomes cold, employees in the poorly heated building start to gripe.
sentences.cn: 天冷时, 在这座取暖条件差的楼房里办公的员工就开始抱怨.

sentences.en: Farmers everywhere gripe all the time and Brazilians, needless to say, are no exception.
sentences.cn: 各地农民总是抱怨, 不用说, 巴西的农民也不例外.

sentences.en: For those who constantly gripe about life, turn and walk away.
sentences.cn: 对经常抱怨生活的人, 转身离开.

sentences.en: He likes to have a good gripe from time to time.
sentences.cn: 他时常爱发上一通牢骚.

sentences.en: I have a gripe about the service here.
sentences.cn: 我对这里的服务有一点不满意.

sentences.en: It is not uncommon to hear the man in the street gripe about hospital services.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们也不时可以听到许多民众对医院的不满和投诉.

sentences.en: Most people would gripe about a job like that.
sentences.cn: 大多数人都会抱怨这样一份工作.

sentences.en: My main gripe is that the heater doesn't work in the hotel room.
sentences.cn: 我最大的抱怨就是旅馆里房间的暖气是坏的.

sentences.en: My only gripe about the hotel was the food.
sentences.cn: 我对这家旅馆唯一不满的是伙食。

sentences.en: The one gripe I do have with the Quest is in the level design.
sentences.cn: 我确实有寻求有的一报怨在水平内设计.

sentences.en: This precludes gripe sessions about wages and holidays.
sentences.cn: 避免有关工资和假期方面的讨论.

sentences.en: Why are football players griping when the average salary is half a million dollars?
sentences.cn: 为什么足球运动员平均薪水50万美元还总是发牢骚呢？

words.tran_cn: 扣人心弦的；引人注意的；令人全神贯注的

trans.tran_cn: 抱怨； 惹恼， 激怒
